about_the_game:
Welcome to Beach Vacation Simulator, the cutting-edge simulator that offers an unparalleled experience of tranquility. Immerse yourself in a virtual paradise where your only priority is to take in the sights and sounds of the waves and wind brushing against the beach.

There are gamers getting headshot in the room next door. But not you.


The paladin in that streamer's party really wants that shield to drop and has to run that dungeon over a 100 times. Not you.


Your family is locked into the TV for the news waiting with bated breath over what is going to happen tomorrow. Not you.

It's all good. Just take a breath in. Look at the waves. Hear them crash. And let that breath out.
detailed_description:
CHECK OUT MY OTHER GAMES!





About the Game

Welcome to Beach Vacation Simulator, the cutting-edge simulator that offers an unparalleled experience of tranquility. Immerse yourself in a virtual paradise where your only priority is to take in the sights and sounds of the waves and wind brushing against the beach.

There are gamers getting headshot in the room next door. But not you.


The paladin in that streamer's party really wants that shield to drop and has to run that dungeon over a 100 times. Not you.


Your family is locked into the TV for the news waiting with bated breath over what is going to happen tomorrow. Not you.

It's all good. Just take a breath in. Look at the waves. Hear them crash. And let that breath out.
name: Beach Vacation Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970

reviews:
“When I finished the bit of development and started testing, my blood pressure suddenly dropped”
420 – scott_hf
